body_html: I second this issue. I see this all the time with DataLoader that uses multiple processes. Would be much better if those child processes handled signals that their parent died and terminated, too.
body_text: I second this issue.  I see this all the time with DataLoader that uses multiple processes.  Would be much better if those child processes handled signals that their parent died and terminated, too.
body: I second this issue.  I see this all the time with DataLoader that uses multiple processes.  Would be much better if those child processes handled signals that their parent died and terminated, too.
